verbose_text: Here, we show that CORT pellet implantation suppresses virtually all proliferation in Type-1 and -2 cells in the GCL of 3-month-old mice where both GR+ and GR- NSPC coexist, in agreement with several previous studies indicating that GC control NSPC proliferation both by direct and indirect mechanisms [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: CORT pellet implantation suppresses virtually all proliferation in Type-1 and -2 cells in the GCL
